name: directline-jabber
description: Uses the Directline Jabber testing tool in your Azure DevOps pipelines.
author: Jonas Van der Biest

inputs.name: authentication
inputs.label: Directline authentication
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify authentication you would like to use for directline. You can use a directline secret that does the authentication directly or you could use your endpoint that generates a token for communcation with directline. See repository for more information.

inputs.name: directlineSecretValue
inputs.label: Directline secret
inputs.helpMarkDown: Your secret that you can find in the bot channels registration directline channel on Azure

inputs.name: tokenValue
inputs.label: Endpoint Token
inputs.helpMarkDown: An endpoint token that generates a token to use with directline

inputs.name: folderPath
inputs.label: Folder path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify a directory with your transcript files.

inputs.name: includeSubfolders
inputs.label: Include sub folders
inputs.helpMarkDown: Indicate whether sub folders will be included when looking for transcript files.

inputs.name: preprocessFilePath
inputs.label: Preprocess file path
inputs.helpMarkDown: A file that contains activities to process before the actual conversation

inputs.name: userId
inputs.label: Replace conversation user id
inputs.helpMarkDown: Replaces the user id with the specified one in a conversation.

inputs.name: userIdPrefix
inputs.label: Use a prefix for the user id
inputs.helpMarkDown: Prefixes the user id with the specified one in a conversation.
